sentence.Network_en: We know that some of man's close ancestors predated the Pleistocene.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们知道,有些人类近缘祖先出现于更新世之前.

sentence.Network_en: Pleistocene glaciation caused the extinction of many species.
sentence.Network_cn: 第四纪冰期,使许多物种绝灭.

sentence.Network_en: During the Pleistocene Ice Age , the ancient drainage systems were almost completely rearranged by glaciation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在更新世冰期, 古水系常被冰川作用完全改造.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文2012年1月18日 -  哥伦比亚猛犸象是一种已经灭绝的史前哺乳动物,更新世(Pleistocene)晚期生活在北美洲相对温暖、潮湿的地区,故其身上并没有像真猛犸象那样浓密的长毛。.
pleistocene marine sediments along russian coast ., 俄罗斯沿岸的更新统海洋沉积.

list.abs: study of pleistocene depositional environment in the downstream of the xiangjiang river ., 湘江下游更新世沉积环境的初步研究.
the pleistocene climate of changjiang valley ., 长江谷地更新世气候.
types of pleistocene basins along the coast of russia ., 俄罗斯沿岸更新世盆地类型.
Mummies of pleistocene ground sloths , with original skin , hair , tendons and claws have been found ., 还发现了保存原有皮肤 , 毛发 , 腱和爪的更新世时期地面树懒的木乃伊.

means.word_mean: 1. from two million to 11 thousand years ago; extensive glaciation of the northern hemisphere; the time of human evolution
